interests.name: Water Polo Lessons
interests.description: London offers a unique experience of water polo in freezing temperatures. Seems like it might be a good way to relax.
interests.review: NOT A GOOD WAY TO RELAX

interests.name: Wine tasting
interests.description: Paris has a farm vineyard thing that sells you expensive grape juice that makes you feel funny.

interests.name: video game arcade
interests.description: Berlin has this hidden gem video game arcade that is supposed to have an original street fighter 2 machine. bring plenty of quarters.

interests.name: Futsal Soccer Pickup Game
interests.description: the locals in berlin hold a futsal soccer game every thursday at the park. no shinguards required, but they are recommended.
